name: Ludos Protocol
description: The Ludos Protocol is a decentralized solution for game ecosystem. The protocol is mainly composed of three parts:Main chain + multi-sidechain infrastructure, Toolbox for game developers, DApps and incentivized game ecosystem. Ludos will use blockchain technology and token economy to reform the game industry, enhance the flow of resources between upstream and downstream industries, provide game players with a more transparent gaming environment, and bring more customer flow and new opportunities to developers.
